medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced sharp pain that started at 2am after consuming a large seafood dinner the previous evening. The pain radiated upward and worsened during transport to the hospital. She experienced diaphoresis on the way to the hospital, attributed to anxiety. The pain resolved around 3am after receiving treatment in the ED.
medical_history.family_history: Non-contributory. Denies cardiovascular disease, cancer, or diabetes mellitus history in family.
